post.summary: Withdraw funds from trade wallet to main wallet

get.description: As an Admin, I want to view performance stats to assess product success. Returns summary and per-plan metrics.

post.description: As an Admin, I want to create new investment plans so users can invest. Use the example in the request body to proceed.

get.description: List plans with optional filters. Use query params for status, visibility, riskLevel, category, page, limit.
View full plan details including ROI, duration, limits.

patch.description: As an Admin, I want to update ROI, duration, or limits so products stay accurate. Core terms (rate, duration, minAmount) cannot change while the plan has active investments.

400.description: Cannot delete plan with user investments

get.description: View performance stats for a single plan: total invested, active/completed counts, profit paid, ROI.

patch.description: As an Admin, I want to deactivate an investment product if it is no longer available. Toggles between active and inactive.

400.description: Cannot archive plan with active investments

get.description: List user investments with optional filters. Use query params: status, riskFlag, userId, investmentId, isFrozen, dateFrom, dateTo, minAmount, maxAmount, page, limit, sortBy, sortOrder. Example values are in the schema.
get.summary: Get all user investments with filters

get.description: List investment plans with reduced parameters: status, page, limit. Use example values to proceed.
Get all investments for a user by userId.

get.summary: Get specific user investment by ID

post.summary: Adjust profit amount for completed investment
Validate if an investment action can be performed

get.summary: Get daily reports for date range

post.summary: Regenerate daily report for specific date

get.description: List all wallets with optional filters. Use query params for userId, status, frozen, minBalance, maxBalance, page, limit.
Get a single users wallet by their user ID. Returns balance, trade balance, status, frozen state.

404.description: Wallet not found for this user

get.summary: View specific user wallet by userId

patch.description: Credit or debit a users wallet by userId. Use example body to proceed.
Lock the users wallet so they cannot withdraw or transfer. Use example body to proceed.

get.description: Fetch a single wallet by its MongoDB _id (walletId).

post.description: Adjust any users wallet by userId. Use the example body to proceed.

parameters.name: status

post.summary: Create or update any system setting

role.description: Role of the SUPER-ADMIN, ADMIN, or USER (default is "USER")

identifier.description: User identifier (email, phone number, or username)

amount.description: Adjustment amount in USDT. Positive = credit, negative = debit.

adminNotes.description: Internal admin notes (not shown to user)

maxAmount.description: Maximum investment amount (USDT). Omit for no cap.

maxActiveUsers.description: Max number of users who can invest (0 = unlimited)

allowMultipleInvestments.description: Allow user to have multiple positions in this plan

description.example: 30-day fixed return plan with 15% annualized ROI. Ideal for balanced risk appetite.

adminNotes.description: Internal admin notes (not shown to users)
adminNotes.example: Q1 2025 launch. Review limits in June.

rate.description: ROI rate in percent. Cannot change if plan has active investments.

durationDays.description: Duration in days. Cannot change if plan has active investments.

minAmount.description: Minimum investment (USDT). Cannot change if plan has active investments.

userId.description: User ID whose wallet to adjust

amount.description: Adjustment amount in USDT. Positive = credit, negative = debit.

newPassword.description: New password (if not provided, a reset link may be sent)
